content.text:
# Waryong Park

| established =
| mapframe-zoom = 14
}}
Waryong Park () is a park in , Jongno District, Seoul, South Korea. It was founded in 1984. It is adjacent to the mountain Bugaksan. The park is so named because it resembles a dragon () laying down.
The park was renovated in 2023, with safety railing and additional flora installed in the park.
